name: Bleepy Bloopy: Let's Go Shooty
description:
Bleep-bloop has found himself in a tricksy situation. 

Alone on a ship plummeting towards to the surface of an alien planet he must defend himself and repair parts of the ship to escape, and hopefully find an escape from the chaos of space. 

REQUIRES A CONTROLLER TO PLAY.

 Controls: 
* Left Stick = Move
* Right Stick = Shoot
* (A) = Pickup / Drop

======================

Made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2020
